plot: Somewhere in a dystopian future, a TV studio struggles to stay afloat by broadcasting live recreations of old film noir movies.
plot_en: Somewhere in a dystopian future, a TV studio struggles to stay afloat by broadcasting live recreations of old film noir movies.
plot_es: Somewhere in a dystopian future, a TV studio struggles to stay afloat by broadcasting live recreations of old film noir movies.
title: The Movie Parody Network
